trans-unit.source: Implements the <c>LC</c> task.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <c>LC</c> 工作。

trans-unit.source: Use the <c>LC</c> element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: 請使用專案檔中的 <c>LC</c> 項目，來建立和執行這項工作。

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [LC Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5a53472-6f2a-42b8-a6db-593ca99c9790).
trans-unit.target: 如需用法和參數資訊，請參閱 [LC Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5a53472-6f2a-42b8-a6db-593ca99c9790)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.LC" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.LC" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Command line builder to add arguments to.
trans-unit.target: 要加入引數的命令列產生器。

trans-unit.source: Generates command line arguments that the license compiler tool (lc.exe) must run directly from the command line and not from a response file.
trans-unit.target: 產生授權編譯器工具 (lc.exe) 必須直接從命令列 (而不是從回應檔) 執行的命令列工具引數。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full file path of the license compiler tool (lc.exe).
trans-unit.target: 傳回授權編譯器工具 (lc.exe) 的完整檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: The full file path of the license compiler tool, or <see langword="null" /> if the license compiler tool file is not found.
trans-unit.target: 授權編譯器工具的完整檔案路徑，如果找不到授權編譯器工具檔則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the executable for which the .licenses files are generated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要產生 .licenses 檔案的可執行檔。

trans-unit.source: The executable for which the .licenses files are generated.
trans-unit.target: 要產生 .licenses 檔案的可執行檔。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether to suppress the Microsoft startup banner display.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，這個值指定是否隱藏 Microsoft 程式啟始資訊顯示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Microsoft startup banner display is suppressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果會隱藏 Microsoft 程式啟始資訊顯示則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the directory in which to place the output .licenses files.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要放置輸出 .licenses 檔案的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The directory in which to place the output .licenses files.
trans-unit.target: 要放置輸出 .licenses 檔案的目錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the .licenses file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 .license 檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the .licenses file.
trans-unit.target: .license 檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a name, the name of the .licx file is used and the .licenses file is placed in the directory that contains the .licx file.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定名稱，就會使用 .licx 檔案的名稱，並將 .licenses 檔案放在包含 .licx 檔案的目錄中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the referenced components to load when generating the .licenses file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定產生 .licenses 檔案時所要載入的參考元件。

trans-unit.source: The referenced components to load when generating the .licenses file.
trans-unit.target: 產生 .licenses 檔案時所要載入的參考元件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to use to search for the SDK tools.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用來搜尋 SDK 工具的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns the SDK tools path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 SDK 工具路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the items that contain licensed components to include in the .licenses file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要包含在 .licenses 檔案中，包含授權元件的項目。

trans-unit.source: The items that contain licensed components to include in the .licenses file.
trans-unit.target: 要包含在 .licenses 檔案中，包含授權元件的項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the documentation for the `/complist` switch in [Lc.exe (License Compiler)](~/docs/framework/tools/lc-exe-license-compiler.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Lc.exe (授權編譯器)](~/docs/framework/tools/lc-exe-license-compiler.md) 中 `/complist` 參數的記載說明。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the license compiler tool.
trans-unit.target: 取得授權編譯器工具的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the license compiler tool.
trans-unit.target: 授權編譯器工具的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Validates input parameters and logs errors or warnings, if any.
trans-unit.target: 驗證輸入參數及記錄錯誤或警告 (如果有)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether task execution should proceed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指出是否應該繼續執行工作的布林值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if task execution should proceed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作執行應該繼續，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
